about_the_game:
The original soundtrack from Achilles: Legends Untold, created by Adam Skorupa, Michał Cielecki and Krzysztof Wierzynkiewicz the award-winning, most famous Polish composers of game music, is now available for sale.

One-of-a-kind epic, exciting music was created especially for the game, straight from the soundtrack creator for titles such as The Witcher, The Witcher 2, Bulletstorm and Green Hell.

Wherever you are, you can listen how Legends Untold sounds.
